page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: {Hayswood Farm, Madresfield. Farmer: Mr.C.J.Bennett Two farmhouses,one 17th century,one late 18th century. 200 acres. 9 buildings _ barns and livestock housing. Dairy cows.Silage and root crops. Mechanised. 3 workers. {Portocks End Farm,Guarlford, Malvern. Farmer: Mr.H.C.Bladder Farm 200 yrs old. 65 acres. Cattle sheds,brick barn,timber barn. Dairy heifers and hens. Silage and hay. Mechanised. 3 workers. All 9 fields have names. One field has a windmill. Until mainswater, it supplied the Herriots ( the blacksmith's) the farm, and Dripshill House.
